\subsection{Detailed Description}
Exception inheriting from \hyperlink{classutils_1_1u8char__error}{u8char\+\_\+error}. It is thrown when\+:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item bytes held by the object do not represent a valid U\+T\+F-\/8 character 
\end{DoxyItemize}
